storyInfo: The bitter fight draws to an end with Severin's breakthrough. Severin tries to quell the unrest with death, but is stopped by Rhodes Island. Mudrock seems to have a change in heart, and deescalates the battle.

attributes.content: Ah! Schultz! That's where you were!
attributes.name: Wounded Townsfolk

attributes.content: I heard you were hurt. Are you being discharged?
attributes.name: Wounded Townsfolk

attributes.content: *cough*... There are so many wounded. If this keeps up, we'll run out of beds.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Tatjana... how is Tatjana?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I- I'm not sure. I heard someone burned to death in front of her, and she...
attributes.name: Wounded Townsfolk

attributes.content: Urk... Ahhh...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Let it out, child. Just let it all out.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I- I'm sorry... I just...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: A good cry is healthy.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But it's still chaos out there!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I'll go. Between me, and the Rhodes Island team...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We'll figure it out.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No... Don't tell me...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Take her to a bed. I'm taking command.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Wounded Townsfolk

attributes.content: Uncle...! Promise me! Promise me you won't get yourself killed!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: It's pointless.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: It's pointless to even say it's pointless.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Have some hope, at least. There's always a chance to turn things around.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Let me... through!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We did it! We shattered the giants!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: This persistence... unexpected.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If you keep holding back, we won't make it out in one piece.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Your eyes are full of hatred, and emptiness.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You are angry about Dr. Atro. But what of it?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We all have our own baggage.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Don't you dare... speak her name.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: When winter comes, when the famine comes, you will still lose. No one will survive.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Wolumonde... will end.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That goes without saying.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Who is it you hate? Who are you going to save?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Grr! Those Arts again!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Gaaaaaaaah!
attributes.name: Mudrock Colossus

attributes.content: Folinic!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Delaying the time it takes for Mudrock's Arts to activate... what a strange ability.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But, do you really have the luxury to be getting distracted?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hey! L-let go of me!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You're lucky. If you were a few years older, I'd have already hacked off your dominant hand.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Suzuran?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Don't try to run.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: GRAAAAAAAHHHH—!
attributes.name: Mudrock Colossus

attributes.content: You're just a medic. Don't try to fight.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Severin! You can't!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Another... warrior.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We found the real murderer.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The one behind everything! The traitor Biederman! Just moments ago brought to the Rathaus by the Rhodes Island operators!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wait, Biederman... Biederman's still alive? What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Don't listen to his bullshit! Does it even matter who the real murderer is?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: What we're fighting for is the end marginalization of the Infected, and the end to the aristocracy's exploitation of the working class! Winterwisp will rightfully reclaim its land!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We are Reunion! A new era begins today!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Look, Severin, it's useless...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Then kill me, Reunion. Let's have a good fight.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And then what? Winter and famine will still destroy this city.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It may be a dead end. But I'd rather believe Rhodes Island can keep things from getting worse.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: At least some will survive.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You see how bruised and battered you are. Your mask is half broken. Your giant is falling apart. And you're exhausted, aren't you?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I can tell. We're not so different, you and I.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Say, got a light?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It'll be my last cigarette anyway... Forget it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: (Do it. Now. Don't give them a chance to save me.)
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Severin Hawthorn, when you die, I will leave this place.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: This is a ghost town. Staying here is just waiting to die.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I will tell them of your death. If they still wish to harm others, I shall personally deal with them.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...Fair enough.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Farewell.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: These Arts, what is this power...?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Wh-why... must you die?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Get out of here, girl!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Don't die!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I have to... so that others can live!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hey! Mudrock's in trouble! Let's go help him! Don't let up!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: B-but they even broke the colossi...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Surrender.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Sarkaz is lost. What do you have to fight for?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: If you just need to vent your frustration, fine. I volunteer.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Until you're satisfied.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hurry! Fire up the Gramophone!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I, I don't know Leithanian Arts. Go get us a Leithanian. What, what's that up there? A drone?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Don't look up! Look behind you! There's something with red eyes...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You probably shouldn't move. GreyThroat has you in her sights.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Oh and you don't want to turn around and look for her either. I'm watching you too.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: You seethe. You protect. How many times is this?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You... Heh, you actually beat me.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Drop your weapon. You're not getting away this time, Mudrock.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: You'll leave them hating Wolumonde same as they always did!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. They don't really want change. They only care about what's good for them.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: They could have worked together to get through the crisis. They didn't. They didn't care about the truth. They just wanted to loot and riot.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Miss Tatjana is right. Even if you sacrifice yourself, it won't help anything.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No matter how complex the backstory here is, a Rhodes Island operator won't sit by while Infected rioters destroy a town.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: A town Atro wanted to protect.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A Rhodes Island op team will die defending this plaza, this town hall.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Really, this might lead to so much more death...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But that's after. After 'you' and after 'us.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: As long as we're still here, we'll fight to the end. So Atro can rest in peace.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You really have defeated me... Maybe you can actually defend this tower to the death. But... why?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Many will die.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Just like Atro. A meaningless death.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The Infected have a reason to fight.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: There's always a justification. But for now, you're not solving the problem. You're only causing destruction.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: After the Catastrophe struck Wolumonde, with supplies low and manpower short, what did you do?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Tell me. Tell me what you did!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You were told not to move.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Your Arts are so sloppy that at this distance, my crossbow is enough to incapacitate you.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What led to that fire? And what did that fire lead to?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The mastermind is already dead.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Is he?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Retreat.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What? But we just...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I said, retreat.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Only a few... can pass through the Great Rift and return to the land of warmth.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It doesn't matter if you want to take back your land or get revenge on the rich... You will only end up a corpse in the snow.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Do you want to spend the winter burning with rage? Do you want to warm yourselves with a fire fed with the bodies of innocents?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The murderer is dead. It's time to leave.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: B-but we have to take back Wolumonde! It's our land!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Quiet, Winterwisp. All you want is power. You want to cower behind the strong and pick up whatever scraps of power we leave behind.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don't question the leader. Wise up, or you'll be six feet under.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Err...
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: This isn't over!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We lost so many people! Are we going to leave like that? With our tails between our legs? Just because of a few words?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Calm him down, friends.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Graaaaagh...
Gaaaah! A.... fist...?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: A stone fist from underground? You still have the strength?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You don't need to go that far just to stop them. They were on our side until a minute ago.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I wanted to scare them, but... never mind...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And stop calling your Arts monsters 'friends.' It's creepy.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You don't have to listen. Leave me alone.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I have decided to retreat. I can't force you all to listen, but...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I am leaving. Those who follow me are also leaving.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Those who stay... you're on your own.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: By the way, do you have a match?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They might be wet. Those casters back there were a real pain.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Give a light to that Severin man.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Defeated warriors... are lucky to leave the battlefield alive. Don't dawdle.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Pfah! Forget about Reunion then! It's only a matter of time before we take the Rathaus. This town needs us!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Surrender, Severin!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I told you they wouldn't go down easily *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They're coming! Eyes left!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Get behind me.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ugh. Bunch of lunatics.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is protecting this place. You have to go through us.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: They're going to use Arts. Prepare the defenses. Target the casters.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Wh- what? They blocked my Arts?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Why are you doing this?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Leader's orders.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Even if we have to fight you, devil, we're not giving up!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What happened? Are they fighting each other?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wait... Mudrock... stopped moving?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Leader?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Earth.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Arise...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Stop, Mudrock. You're burning through your own life.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You don't have to use that ancient power—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I said... Arise!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: All the rubble begins to condense into a single point.
A giant, looking out over the distant mountains.
Mudrock, however, stands motionless.
It's... huge!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A last gasp. Its body is collapsing. He pushed himself too hard.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Fall back. Don't be hasty.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: N-no... Mudrock already spent all his energy. These Arts...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: That's Sarkaz... witchcraft?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: (I said...)
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I said...
attributes.name: Mudrock Colossus

attributes.content: This is way too dangerous. You're sharing your life with your own creation. It's not worth it just to subdue them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Fine. As you wish.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: (Shed your hate and strife. Live. This is your last chance to escape.)
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Leave this place.
attributes.name: Mudrock Colossus

attributes.content: (Those who still fight... only seek death for all.)
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: So... come destroy me.
attributes.name: Mudrock Colossus

attributes.content: Come defeat me!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Wh-why...? Didn't he come to help us? Is he not Reunion?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I... I don't care! Screw him!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: In the past... we helped you. That fire unsettled us all.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We joined you, we guided you, but not for the sake of their deaths. Only for the sake of our lives.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Now, sadly, it looks like we're not on the same side.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Killing innocent people, and Rhodes Island's warriors, that's not our way.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: And if we're dealing with a bunch of rioters who don't follow orders, why show mercy?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Us, the Sarkaz, the 'devils,' we're enough to take on anyone.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: More than enough.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What happened? Everything got quiet as soon as that giant appeared.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So uh, that mountain-sized monster is a kind of Originium Art?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Let's figure out how to get back to Folinic.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Gah! Damn it!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Come on, let's go. This town is done for. We have to find a way over the Great Rift before winter sets in!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Abandon the town, Winterwisp clansmen, workers, and Infected.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: There are other places to exact our revenge. Leave Wolumonde to its fate!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: There's no reason to fight the Sarkaz. Fall back.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Mudrock, that's enough!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Phew... Haah... Haah...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They stopped... That was crazy. Since when are we in the conflict mediation business?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Look at this town... We, brought chaos.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's not what we intended, but a rebellion is about self-interest, at its core. Not so many people come with high-minded ideals.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You're right... So what do we do with our struggle...? With our deceased?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Loss and pain follow us everywhere.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Erm, just a second... I found a spare match.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hey, Gendarmerie, here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Huh. Do Sarkaz warriors smoke?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I already quit.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: How about that. Looks like everyone who quits still carries matches.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Cherish your life.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And you, Rhodes Islanders...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's time... to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Maybe... just maybe, you can find a way to help these people.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But none of that has anything to do with the Sarkaz anymore.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: To the sound of crumbling rock, the Sarkaz turn and leave.
The entire block is burning.
The mob is gone, having left only out of fear.
The last chunk tumbles to the ground.
